mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sample_time AS "sampleTime", a.sample_quantity AS "sampleQuantity", a.total_number_of_samples AS "totalNumberOfSamples", a.submission_time AS "submissionTime", a.product_handle_person_id AS "productHandlePersonId", a.product_next_handle_person_id AS "productNextHandlePersonId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", mp.product_number AS "marketProduct.productNumber", mp.english_name AS "marketProduct.englishName", mp.chinese_name AS "marketProduct.chineseName"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mms_comprehensive_product( id, sample_time, sample_quantity, total_number_of_samples, submission_time, product_handle_person_id, product_next_handle_person_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sampleTime}, #{sampleQuantity}, #{totalNumberOfSamples}, #{submissionTime}, #{productHandlePersonId}, #{productNextHandlePersonId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
